= Introduction =

This page describes the requirements of the software.


= First version =

Communication requirements:
  #. the server should support minimum 100 of simultaneous client connections;

Client requirements:
  #. a window with a primary view and alternate views;
  #. primary view: a display panel with all the utterances, a text area and a send button;
  #. possibility to add a reference (a link) to a previous message from the conversation;
  #. alternate view 1: threaded chat accordingly to the references;
  #. possibility to create a poll and vote in a poll;

Server requirements:
  #. store all the client messages (utterances and control messages like a reference) in a database (or XML file);
  #. store the polls and the votes in a database (or XML file)

Design questions:
  #. which protocol to use? an existing one or a new one? keep in mind the multi-user chat and the need vor various control messages;
  #. storing the information: DB or XML;
  #. communication: java sockets;
